title: UPDATE: Suspect in Fatal Shooting of 14-Year-Old Turns Himself In
content:
ST. LOUIS (KMOX/AP) — A 14-year-old girl has been fatally shot in a St. Louis home — the 14-year-old boy suspected of shooting her has turned himself in.
Police identified the victim as Jamayha Luss. She was found suffering from a gunshot to the back Sunday afternoon at a friend’s home. She was rushed to a hospital, where she died.
Two teenage boys had come to the friend’s house before the shooting. Authorities believe that one of the teens had a gun. The teenage boys left before police arrived.
St. Louis police didn’t make any other information about the suspect available.
